verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: suffered] [ARG1: another brain fart] [ARGM-LOC: at festivities intended to spite the Philadelphia Eagles for not taking a knee at NFL games] .
Donald Trump suffered another brain fart at festivities [V: intended] [ARG1: to spite the Philadelphia Eagles for not taking a knee at NFL games] .
[ARG0: Donald Trump] suffered another brain fart at festivities intended to [V: spite] [ARG1: the Philadelphia Eagles] [ARG2: for not taking a knee at NFL games] .
Donald Trump suffered another brain fart at festivities intended to spite [ARG0: the Philadelphia Eagles] for [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: taking] [ARG1: a knee] [ARGM-LOC: at NFL games] .
